name: gss_channel_bindings_struct
desc: The structure defining a channel bindings descriptor that specifies the communications channel used to carry a context.

items.name: var initiator_addrtype: OM_uint32
items.desc: The type of address contained in the initiator_address field.

items.name: var initiator_address: gss_buffer_desc
items.desc: The network address of the acceptor, in the form specified by initiator_addrtype.

items.name: var acceptor_addrtype: OM_uint32
items.desc: The type of address contained in the acceptor_address field.

items.name: var acceptor_address: gss_buffer_desc
items.desc: The network address of the acceptor, in the form specified by acceptor_addrtype.

items.name: var application_data: gss_buffer_desc
items.desc: Application specific data for use in communicating a channel binding.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initialize a new, empty channel bindings structure.

items.name: init(initiator_addrtype: OM_uint32, initiator_address: gss_buffer_desc, acceptor_addrtype: OM_uint32, acceptor_address: gss_buffer_desc, application_data: gss_buffer_desc)
items.desc: Initialize a new channel bindings structure with the given configuration.
